github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Generate commit messages using the Conventional Commits format with emojis.

github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: When generating PowerShell scripts, use Windows PowerShell syntax. Always use semicolons (;) as command separators, not ampersands. When changing directories with cd/Set-Location, always enclose paths in double quotes. Example: cd "C:\path\to\directory"; Get-ChildItem
